Articles.Content:
This could be just me but I have a problem with the AI with the mod that adds tank turrets, Fox Defense Contracts.

The tank turrets preform normaly and the AI shoot at each other but after a while they stop and I cant seem to make them fight again, there is still ammo so its not an amunition depletion or anything so im lost for what it could be for now

Edited August 29, 2019 by Shocktrooper1029

Welcome to the forum @Shocktrooper1029.

If you mention which mod you are having issues with, I will move your question into that actual thread so that you can get accurate information.
